parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Nominative Neuter Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Apparently a primary word; 'shade' or a shadow (darkness of error or an adumbration).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Neuter Plural
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Anointed One; the Messiah, the Christ. From chrio; Anointed One, i.e. The Messiah, an epithet of Jesus.
